column13: Interior renovation of 1030 SF on the second floor of the Chicago GSB Hyde Park Center. Suite 211 houses the accounting and budget office and will be renovated to accommodate (2) offices, (2) meeting rooms and (5) work stations. Removal of non load-bearing partitions, new partitions, finishes and furnishings.
Install 1 2-stop V.W.C.L at 5242 S.Hyde Park pursuant to plans submitted & in compliance with City of Chicago Building codes.

Hyde Park High School:Installation of dehumidification rooftop unit for indoor swimming pool and associated mechanical ductwork, pool gutter replacement, structural steel platform for rooftop unit, accessible building entrance sloped ramp and roofing replacement at one roof.

Installation of (1) 1400#, 2-stop, LULA elevator at Chicago Public School (Hyde Park H.S.) pursuant to plans submitted. Installation to be made in compliance with 2010 City of Chicago Elevator Code & subject to field inspection.

Installation of (1) 1400#, 2-stop, LULA elevator at Chicago Public School (Hyde Park H.S.) pursuant to plans submitted. Installation to be made in compliance with 2010 City of Chicago Elevator Code & subject to field inspection.
Installation of (1) vertical wheelchair lift in Chicago Public School (Hyde Park Academy)near stage pursuant to plans submitted.
PERMIT EXPIRES ON 11/23/2014 erect 2 mobile stages for the the 2014 Hyde Park Jazz Festival 9-27-14 & 9-28-2014 (main stage & second stage) second stage to be erect at 1199 E. Midway Plasiance.
